title: segfault with PyTorch + fastText
body_html:
When I import PyTorch and fastText (either order), I get a segmentation fault.

Versions:
CentOS 7.5.1804
Python 3.6.5 (conda 4.5.0)
PyTorch 0.4.0, installed through conda
fastText 0.8.22, installed from source (from these instructions for python)

Stacktrace from gdb:
gdb.txt

body:
When I import PyTorch and fastText (either order), I get a segmentation fault.

**Versions**:
CentOS 7.5.1804
Python 3.6.5 (conda 4.5.0)
PyTorch 0.4.0, installed through conda
fastText 0.8.22, installed from source (from [these instructions](https://github.com/facebookresearch/fastText#building-fasttext) for python)

Stacktrace from gdb:
[gdb.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/2121150/gdb.txt)
